original_text: But Shammah stood in the middle of the field to stop the Philistines taking it for themselves. He killed the Philistines. The Lord caused him to win a great battle.
korean_text: 그는 그 밭 가운데 서서 막아 블레셋 사람들을 친지라 여호와께서 큰 구원을 이루시니라

sentences.original_text: But Shammah stood in the middle of the field
to stop the Philistines taking it for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람들이 그것을 차지하는 것을 막기 위해

sentences.original_text: The Lord caused him to win a great battle
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 그가 큰 싸움에서 이기게 하셨습니다
